formula: a(n)=sum(m=0..(n-1)/2, (sum(j=1..2*m+1, j!*2^(2*m-j+1)*(-1)^(m+j+1)* stirling2(2*m+1,j)))*sum(r=2*m+1..n,(stirling1(r,2*m+1)*sum(k=r..n, binomial(k-1,r-1)*k!*2^(n-k)*stirling2(n,k)*(-1)^(r+k)))/r!)). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 21 2011a(n) ~ (-1)^(n+1) * n! / ((2-exp(-Pi/2)) * (log(2*exp(Pi/2)-1)/2)^(n+1)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 02 2015
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs Mar 15 1997 by _Olivier GÃ©rard_.
